column5: Dont know if this was posted anywhere before...but found it interesting and a little shocking.  http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/shutdown.html
You'll have to stay here in Canada then. Too bad that little local pond isn't just chalk full of walleye and pike.......oh wait....it is.
I've been following that Simon. Minnesota is a 35 minute drive for me. It's really such a sad state of affairs down there.
